ðŸ“– Summary: Trayy is a Windows application written in C++ that allows users to minimize specified applications to the system tray, effectively hiding them from the taskbar. It supports various application types, including PWAs and traditional desktop applications, and offers features like quick actions via right-click menus and compatibility with Windows 10 and 11.
